  • FAQ

FAQs: Your Guide to Oorwin

Find quick answers to common questions about pricing, support, onboarding, and more.

What is Oorwin?

Oorwin is an AI-powered talent acquisition and workforce management platform that helps organizations source, manage, and sell talent — all in one unified system. From hiring to onboarding and revenue tracking, Oorwin streamlines the entire talent lifecycle. 

Who is Oorwin for?

Oorwin is designed for: 

  • Recruitment teams (in-house and agency) 
  • HR leaders managing hiring and onboarding 
  • Staffing and consulting firms tracking placements and revenue 
  • IT teams looking for secure, integrated HR tech 
How does Oorwin Ira, the AI agent, help with hiring?

Oorwin Ira automates repetitive tasks like job posting, candidate screening, and interview scheduling. It uses AI to match candidates to roles based on skills, experience, and cultural fit — improving speed and quality of hire. 

Can I integrate Oorwin with my existing ATS or HR tools?

Yes! Oorwin integrates seamlessly with 160+ tools. You can sync data across platforms without manual work. 

Is Oorwin easy to set up and use?

Absolutely. Oorwin is designed for quick onboarding — most teams go live in less than 2 weeks. We provide guided setup, training, and dedicated support to ensure a smooth start. 

Does Oorwin support onboarding and employee management?

Yes. Oorwin includes automated onboarding workflows, document collection, task tracking, and team introductions — ensuring new hires are productive from Day 1. 

Can I track time, expenses, and invoicing within Oorwin?

Yes. Oorwin offers built-in time tracking, expense reporting, and invoice generation — ideal for staffing agencies and consultancies managing billable hours and client billing. 

How secure is my data in Oorwin?

Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security, including: 

  • SOC 2 compliance
  • GDPR & CCPA readiness 
  • Role-based access control 
  • Data encryption (in transit and at rest) 
Do you offer mobile access?

Yes. Oorwin has a responsive web app and a mobile-friendly interface, so you can manage hiring, approvals, and updates on the go. 

What support options are available?

We offer: 

  • 24/5 customer support via email and chat 
  • Dedicated account managers for enterprise clients 
  • Knowledge base, video tutorials, and webinars 
  • Onboarding and training sessions 
Is there a free trial or demo available?

Yes! You can start a free trial or schedule a personalized demo to see how Oorwin works for your team. 

How is Oorwin priced?

Oorwin offers flexible pricing based on team size, usage, and features. We provide custom quotes for enterprises and simple plans for smaller teams. Contact sales for a tailored plan. 

Can I migrate my existing data to Oorwin?

Yes. We support data migration from most ATS and HR systems. Our team will help you import candidates, jobs, and employee records securely and efficiently. 

Can I customize workflows and reports?

Yes. Oorwin allows you to customize hiring workflows, approval chains, dashboards, and reports to match your team’s processes and KPIs.
